(My apologies if I've been ganging up with my numerous characters.  Though 
under most of the circumstances it was fair, some of it wasn't.  I was in a 
bad mood, though that is no excuse.  I will be more careful.  Thanks for the 
person who let me know)


The 
Oblitercons/Hades/Anubis/Bumblebee/Injector/Manterror/Ramhorn/Bumblebee/Double
 Punch/Counter Punch/Koga Shuko/Serpentor/Unitron:




Pyro yelled, seeing the missile coming for him.  All he could do was stay in 
his current mode and hope for the best, all his treads had been slaughtered 
by blasts earlier.  Screaming, the other three Oblitercons up their getting 
out of the blast zone, watched Pyro slide forward through the ground as the 
missile went off, flipping him several times, Pyro reverting to robot mode, 
unconsciouss.

---

Dark One threw the gun he had into the air, Hiss transforming to robot mode 
and landing on his feet.  Raising his weapon, he sighed, hearing Zardus.  He 
had disobeyed orders enough for one day.  He was after all, under a contract. 
 Bringing up his rifle, he fired two bursts off at Set.

---

Breakdown transformed to robot mode, firing six rounds off at Ominous.

---

Hiss fired off three fusion blasts at Hades, two missing.

---

Scavenger felt someone on his hood.  He felt the weight get off.  
Transforming to robot mode, leaning against the tree he had hit for support, 
he saw Dinobot.  Raising his rifle, he heard Zardus' transmission.  <Ok 
mommy, I love ya> he said in a reply to Zardus, falling to his back 
unconsciouss.

---

Hades yelled, Dinobot's shots sending him flying backwards through the air, 
landing on his back.

---

Anubis raised his rifle, firing three plasma shots off at Dinobot.

---

Koga Shuko smiled.  Mass damage had been done.  Even if they retreated, the 
next time they attacked the Ark wouldn't be at full efficiency.  Attack after 
attack WOULD bring down the Ark.  As long as no one stopped them first.  
Raising his missile launcher, he fired a rocket off at the Ark.

---

Serpentor leaned against a rock for support, he had been able to must enough 
to strength to make himself look strong and make the Pred (Cyber Claw) run 
off (so he thinks), but he wasn't starting to get drained.  Firing off his 
last blast from his plasma launcher at the Ark, he sat down, twiddling his 
thumbs.

======

Shockwave's sight came back on.  He had almost been smashed in half, smashing 
through 50 feet of tree branches and a tree itself.  Blast that scaly robot 
who had blew off his wing (Koga Shuko).   Transforming to robot mode, though 
the actual time it took was eight minutes, he began to limp away.  He may be 
able to get a CR chamber.

======

Bumblebee slammed through a tree from Archangel's missiles, going 
unconsciouss.

---

Seeing the rest of the Maxis run off, Manterror picked up Bumblebee, using 
him as a shield to block Ramulus' shots with a crafty smile.  He, Injector, 
and Counter Punch went into the Predacon base.  Injector dumped Ramhorn off 
in Double Punch's quarters, though he stayed to guard him.  

Double Punch, Manterror, and Bumblebee got into CR chambers.

---

Counter went to his quarters despite his wounds.  Activating his interal com, 
he "spoke" in his mind "into the com".  <Zardus, it's your spy, Punch.  The 
little battle between Maxis and Predacons near the Predacon base has ended.  
Three Maximals are down.  One dead.  One reprogrammed.  And one will be 
reprogrammed soon enough.  Minimal damage to the Preds.  Heavy damage to the 
two Maximals who retreated.  The unit Quickstrike seems to show care and 
compassion.  I will be returning to our ship so you may contact me anytime>
Transforming to his dingo mode, he exited the Predacon base, hauling it to 
the Alliance's base.
